name.japanese: パンクハザードBビル通路

description: A corridor passage connecting Buildings A and B in the Punk Hazard research facility. This passage becomes a major battleground when Vergo confronts the G-5 Marines and Sanji.

keyEvents.title: Dragon Attacks G-5 Marines
keyEvents.description: A small dragon attacks the G-5 Marines in this passage.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the ongoing danger from Caesar's experimental creatures.

keyEvents.title: Vergo Arrives in the Passage
keyEvents.description: Vice Admiral Vergo arrives at this passage where the G-5 Marines are located.
keyEvents.significance: Location of Vergo's first appearance and subsequent betrayal.

keyEvents.title: Vergo's Betrayal Revealed
keyEvents.description: Vergo attacks the G-5 Marines in this passage, revealing his true allegiance.
keyEvents.significance: The passage becomes the site of a major betrayal and revelation.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs Vergo Begins
keyEvents.description: Sanji and Vergo begin their battle in this passage.
keyEvents.significance: Major confrontation location between a Straw Hat and a Vice Admiral.

statusHistory.reason: Passage is operational and being used

description: Caesar Clown's private laboratory within the Punk Hazard research facility where he conducts his mad scientist experiments and coordinates his operations.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Smoker Reach Caesar's Lab
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Smoker successfully arrive at Caesar's private laboratory.
keyEvents.significance: Convergence point for the confrontation with Caesar.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Punches Caesar
keyEvents.description: Luffy enters Caesar's lab and immediately attacks him.
keyEvents.significance: Beginning of the direct confrontation with the arc's main antagonist.
